ExperimentTitle:
Experiment 

Gas Welding Fusion Run with filler rod
Steps:
Step 2

 Clean the job surface with the wire brush and remove burrs

Step 3

 Do the marking on the Job using steel ruler and Scriber as per drawing

Step 4

 Perform the punching on the Job using CenterPunch and Hammer

Step 6

 Set the gas pressure on the regulator as per the nozzle size

Step 7

 Check the leakage if any

Step 8

 Fix the nozzole on Welding Torch

Step 9

 Place the Job on the Welding Table

Step 10

 Open the acetylene control valve and light the flame with spark lighter

Step 11

 Set the alignment and start the welding by leftward technique

Step 13

 Close both the gas cylinder valves and check zero reading on pressure guage

Step 14

 Pickup the chipping hammer and remove slag
